name: Flatbread Sandwiches with Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage and Watermelon Salsa
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: Smoked sausage and flatbread are quickly grilled and combined with a juicy watermelon-tomato salsa in this easy sandwich recipe that'll have you grilling all summer long.
ingredients: ¼ cup thinly sliced green onion
1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage
directions: For Watermelon Salsa: In a medium bowl, combine watermelon, tomatoes, green onion, basil, lime juice, salt, and pepper
Place sausage on the rack of a gas or charcoal grill directly over medium heat
Cover and grill for 7 to 9 minutes or until heated through (160 degrees F), turning once
Place flatbreads on grill rack over heat
Grill for 1 to 2 minutes or until lightly toasted, turning once
Divide sliced sausage among toasted flatbreads
Top with Watermelon Salsa and serve with lime wedges
